Class SierpinskiApplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • SierpinskiApplication

  • public class SierpinskiApplication
extends java.lang.Object
    The application frame. This class contains the main method, creating an instance of itself and running the application.
    Version:
    2017-11-15
    Author:
    Stephen

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int ANIMATION_TICK
      Time in milliseconds to wait between animation frames.
      (package private) javax.swing.JFrame applicationFrame
      The frame that holds the application.
      private javax.swing.JCheckBox circleCheckBox
      Check box specifying whether or not to draw inscribed circles on the triangles.
      private int height
      The minimum height of the application.
      private javax.swing.JSlider recursionDepthSlider
      Slider that specifies how many levels of recursion to draw spinners at.
      private javax.swing.JSlider rotationSlider
      Slider that specifies the rotational velocity of the spinners.
      private javax.swing.JSlider sizeSlider
      Slider that specifies the radius of the spinners.
      private SierpinskiPanel sPanel
      The SierpinskiPanel instance responsible for maintaining and computing the state of the spinner as well as drawing it.
      (package private) javax.swing.Timer timer
      Timer that fires at regular intervals to animate the spinners.
      private javax.swing.JCheckBox triangleCheckBox
      Check box specifying whether or not to draw triangles inscribing the circles.
      private int width
      The minimum width of the application.
      private javax.swing.JCheckBox wireframeCheckBox
      Check box specifying whether or not the spinners should be drawn filled in.
